definition[0]: not having received praise or respect for something good you have achieved
example[0]: one of the great unrecognized jazzmen of the 1930s
definition[1]: not noticed or not thought to be important
example[1]: an illness that can go unrecognized for years
definition[2]: an unrecognized group, meeting, agreement etc is not considered to be legal or acceptable by someone in authority
definition[3]: doing something without people recognizing who you are
example[2]: He was able to walk down the street totally unrecognized.
